content: MEXICO CITY  April 10 Mexican airport operator Grupo Aeroportuario del Sureste said on Monday it had agreed to acquire a majority stake in two peers in Colombia  Airplan and Aeropuertos de Oriente  for some $262 million.
name: Grupo Aeroportuario del Sureste SA de CV
title: Mexico's Asur acquires majority in airport groups in Colombia

content: MEXICO CITY  June 17 Mexico's Supreme Court on Wednesday ruled in favor of airport operator Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacifico (GAP) in a four-year dispute with mining and railroad company Grupo Mexico.
name: Grupo Aeroportuario del Sureste SA de CV
title: UPDATE 2-Mexico court rules for airport operator GAP over Grupo Mexico
